Package src

Class TuitionManager

java.lang.Object
src.TuitionManager
public class TuitionManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class is responsible for executing the project. Contains methods for reading standard input, detecting errors, and executing user commands that interact with instance variables.
Author:
Christian Osma, Liam Smith

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TuitionManager()
    Default constructor that creates a new Scanner that reads from standard input, creates a new Enrollment instance with the default constructor, and a new Roster instance with the default constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • TuitionManager

      public TuitionManager()
      Default constructor that creates a new Scanner that reads from standard input, creates a new Enrollment instance with the default constructor, and a new Roster instance with the default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Starts TuitionManager and continuously reads input from the user and calls other methods to handle those commands. Continues until the Q commands which exits the program.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - Error if the file was not found

    • handleSemesterEnd

      private void handleSemesterEnd()
      Handles SE commands which displays the students in the enrollment list that are eligible for graduation after the semester.

    • handlePrintTuition

      private void handlePrintTuition()
      Iterates through the enrollment list and prints out the tuition due by each student, which is handle by the tuitionDue() method in the Student class.

    • handleLoadStudents

      private void handleLoadStudents​(java.lang.String file) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This method reads input from a file passed into it and adds students to the roster depending on the contents of that file.
      Parameters:
      file - String representation of the file to read containing new students
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - Error if the file was not found

    • handleAwardScholarship

      private void handleAwardScholarship​(java.util.StringTokenizer st)
      Awards a scholarship to a specific student by updating their scholarship amount. This method also detects and displays errors such as invalid scholarships, non-resident students, part time students, and if there is not enough information.
      Parameters:
      st - StringTokenizer representing the remainder of the user commands.

    • handleRemoveStudent

      private void handleRemoveStudent​(java.util.StringTokenizer st)
      Removes student from the Roster unless they are not in the roster. Prints out error or success message.
      Parameters:
      st - : StringTokenizer that contains the rest of the user input

    • handleDropStudent

      private void handleDropStudent​(java.util.StringTokenizer st)
      Method that handles dropping a student from enrollment using the remainder of the user commands. Detects and displays errors such as invalid commands and if the student is not in the enrollment list.
      Parameters:
      st - StringTokenizer representing the remainder of the user command

    • handleEnrollStudent

      private void handleEnrollStudent​(java.util.StringTokenizer st)
      This method handles enrolling new students into the enrollment list. This method also detects errors such as invalid commands, invalid date of births, invalid credits enrolled, and if the student is not in the roster.
      Parameters:
      st - StringTokenizer representing the rest of the user command

    • handleAddInternationalStudent

      private void handleAddInternationalStudent​(java.util.StringTokenizer st, boolean isFromLoad)
      This method handles added new international students. Detects errors such as invalid commands, invalid dates, invalid majors, etc. Prints out a success message unless this method was called from handleLoadStudent() method.
      Parameters:
      st - StringTokenizer representing the remainder of user commands
      isFromLoad - true if the method calling this is from handleLoadStudent() and false if not

    • handleAddTristateStudent

      private void handleAddTristateStudent​(java.util.StringTokenizer st, boolean isFromLoad)
      This method handles adding new tri-state students. Detects errors such as invalid states, invalid commands, invalid majors, and invalid credits. Displays success message unless the method is called from handleLoadStudents().
      Parameters:
      st - StringTokenizer representing the remainder of the user command
      isFromLoad - boolean that is true if the method calling it is handleLoadStudent() and false otherwise

    • handleAddNonResident

      private void handleAddNonResident​(java.util.StringTokenizer st, boolean isFromLoad)
      This method handles adding new non-resident students. Detects errors such as invalid commands, invalid major, invalid date of birth, and if the student is already in the roster. Displays success message unless message caller is handleLoadStudents()
      Parameters:
      st - StringTokenizer representing the remainder of the user command
      isFromLoad - true if the method caller is handleLoadStudents() and false otherwise

    • handleAddResident

      private void handleAddResident​(java.util.StringTokenizer st, boolean isFromLoad)
      This method handles adding new resident students. Detects errors such as invalid commands and invalid inputted information about the resident student. Displays success message unless the method caller is handleLoadStudents()
      Parameters:
      st - StringTokenizer containing the remainder of the user command
      isFromLoad - true if the method caller is handleLoadStudents() and false otherwise

    • validDate

      private boolean validDate​(Date date, java.lang.String stringDate)
      Helper method that checks if the date is a valid of date of birth.
      Parameters:
      date - Date object which represents the date to be checked
      stringDate - date inputted by the user, which is used to print error to standard output
      Returns:
      true if the date is a valid date of birth and false otherwise

    • isBeforeCurrent

      private boolean isBeforeCurrent​(Date dob)
      Takes in a student's date of birth and returns true if the student was born before present and false otherwise
      Parameters:
      dob - : student's date of birth
      Returns:
      true if student was born before present day

    • getMajor

      private Major getMajor​(java.lang.String major)
      Takes String input and returns its equivalent value in the enum Major class.
      Parameters:
      major - : String representation of the inputed major
      Returns:
      returns object from Major class depending on input

    • handleChangeMajor

      private void handleChangeMajor​(java.util.StringTokenizer st)
      Changes student major given the rest of the command from the user. Prints out error if major is invalid or if the student is not in the roster and success message if major was successfully changed
      Parameters:
      st - : StringTokenizer that contains the rest of the user command

    • validCredits

      private int validCredits​(java.lang.String number)
      Helper method that calculates the integer value of the inputted String. If the String is not an integer it prints out an error message and returns -1.
      Parameters:
      number - String representation of a number
      Returns:
      the integer value of the String or -1 if it is not valid
